Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.12569105] Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MEC=7 μg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MEC=10 μg/ml).;Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MEC=3 μg/ml), MRSA (MEC=4 μg/ml) at PH 6.5.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-negative bacteria and Gram-positive bacteria.

Literature.Title: Plicatamide, an antimicrobial octapeptide from Styela plicata hemocytes.
Literature.Author: Tincu JA, Menzel LP, Azimov R, Sands J, Hong T, Waring AJ, Taylor SW, Lehrer RI.
